data_table.description: Derived Variables, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: AVN_EYE_31
variable.description: A/V nicking In quadrants indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: FOC_EYE_31
variable.description: Focal narrowing in quadrants indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: RET_HEM_31
variable.description: Retinal hemorrhage indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: FLAM_HEM_31
variable.description: Flame hemorrhage indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: BLOT_HEM_31
variable.description: Blot hemorrhage indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: SOFTEXUD_31
variable.description: Soft exudate indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PAPSWELL_31
variable.description: Papillary swelling indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: MICROANY_31
variable.description: Microaneurysm indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ADV_RTP_31
variable.description: Advanced retinopathy indicator [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: AV_MABP_31
variable.description: Average mean arterial blood pressure [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ASPIRINCODE31
variable.description: Used aspirin-containing analgesics (at visit 3) in last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes), based on 2004 Med. code [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: STATINCODE31
variable.description: Used statin (at visit 3) last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes) based on 2004 Med. code [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ANTICOAGCODE31
variable.description: Used anticoagulates (at visit 3) last 2 weeks (0=no, 1=yes) based on 2004 Med. code [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LVHSCR31
variable.description: Cornell voltage in UV (S in V3+r in AVL) [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: NLVHSC31
variable.description: Cornell voltage in mm [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CLVH31
variable.description: LVH present by Cornell definition [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: MDDXMI31
variable.description: Visit 3, MD diagnosed myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HXOFMI31
variable.description: Visit 3, history of myocardial infarction [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PRVCHD31
variable.description: Visit 3, prevalent coronary heart disease [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PRVCHD32
variable.description: Visit 3, prevalent coronary heart disease, unverified [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: MENOPS31
variable.description: Menopause status variable for visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: BMI32
variable.description: Body Mass Index in kg/m**2 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: QWAVE34A
variable.description: Diagnostic Q-wave present [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: QWAVE37A
variable.description: Visit 3, major Q-wave present with no 7-1-1, 7-1-2, or 7-4, from original machine coded ECG records [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: QWAVE38B
variable.description: Minor Q-wave present with ST or T codes and no 7-1-1, 7-1-2, or 7-4 codes from adjudicated ECG records [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: QWVEM38B
variable.description: Same as QWAVE38b but uses machine code [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ECGMI32
variable.description: Prevalent myocardial infarction from adjudicated ECG [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: MACHMI31
variable.description: Pre myocard infarction from machine coded ECG [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: WORK_I32
variable.description: Work index, definition 2 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: WORK_I33
variable.description: Work index, definition 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ETHANL32
variable.description: Usual alcohol intake in grams/week [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: GRADE31
variable.description: Photo gradable: 1=yes, 0=no [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: GRADE32
variable.description: Grade ability of photo, definition #2 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ARTSS31
variable.description: Arterial sum of squares [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: VEINSS31
variable.description: Vein sum of squares [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CRAE_T
variable.description: Derived CRAE_T [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CRVE
variable.description: Derived CRVE [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CRAE_B
variable.description: Derived CRAE_B [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: AV_T31
variable.description: Derived AV_ratio_T [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: AV_B31
variable.description: Derived AV_ratio_B [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HYPERT34
variable.description: Visit 3, hypertension, definition 4 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HYPERT35
variable.description: Visit 3, hypertension, definition 5 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HYPERT36
variable.description: Visit 3, hypertension, definition 6 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HYPTMD31
variable.description: Visit 3, hypertension medications, definition 1 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CIGT31
variable.description: Version 3, cigarette smoking status [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: Unknown, but one of the above 3 categories may be ruled out

variable.name: DRNKR31
variable.description: Drinker status [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.description: Current drinker [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: FORDRK31
variable.description: Former drinker [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: EVRDRK31
variable.description: Ever drinker [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CURSMK31
variable.description: Current smoker [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: FORSMK31
variable.description: Former smoker [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: EVRSMK31
variable.description: Ever smoker [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HDLSIU31
variable.description: Re-calibrated HDL cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LDL32
variable.description: Re-calibrated LDL cholesterol in mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LDLSIU32
variable.description: Re-calibrated LDL cholesterol in mmol/L [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LISR_I31
variable.description: Leisure index [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: V3AGE31
variable.description: Age at visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: WSTHPR31
variable.description: Waist-to-hip ratio [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: SPRT_I31
variable.description: Sport index [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HORMON31
variable.description: Visit 3, hormone use [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: Former hormone user or former user of other medications reported by participants as hormones

variable.name: TCHSIU31
variable.description: Total cholesterol in SI units [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: TGLEFH31
variable.description: Triglycerides <= 400 mg/dL [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: TRGSIU31
variable.description: Triglycerides in SI units [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: BIFSHD31
variable.description: Shadowing in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: INTSHD31
variable.description: Shadowing in either internal carotid artery [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: COMSHD31
variable.description: Shadowing in either internal carotid artery [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: BIFPLQ31
variable.description: Plaque in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: INTPLQ31
variable.description: Plaque in either internal carotid artery [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: COMPLQ31
variable.description: Plaque in either common carotid artery [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LCOMPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in left common carotid [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: RCOMPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in right common carotid [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LBIFPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in left carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: RBIFPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in right carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LINTPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in left internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: RINTPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in right internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: COMPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadow in either common carotid [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: BIFPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either carotid bifurcation [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: INTPS31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in either internal carotid [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (on either side)

variable.name: LPLQSD31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any left carotid site [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: RPLQSD31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any right carotid site [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: PLQSHD31
variable.description: Plaque/shadowing in any carotid site [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: No plaque or shadow (at both sites)

variable.name: QWAVEM37
variable.description: Same as QWAVE37a but uses machine code [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: COMPLET3
variable.description: Indicator for visit 3 participation [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: DIABTS33
variable.description: Diabetes using lower cut point 140 [mg/dL] [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: DIABTS34
variable.description: Diabetes using lower cut point 126 [mg/dL] [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PLAQUE31
variable.description: Plaque with or without shadowing [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PLAQUE33
variable.description: Plaque with or without shadowing - alternate definition [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: FAST0834
variable.description: Fasting time of 8 hours or more [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: FAST1234
variable.description: Fasting time of 12 hours or more [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ABI34
variable.description: Ankle Brachial Index, visit 3, definition 4 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: ABIV3
variable.description: Ankle Brachial Index measurement status at visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PAD32
variable.description: PAD visit 3, definition 2 (same for both genders) [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PAD31
variable.description: Peripheral artery disease visit 3, definition 1 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: LEGANK31
variable.description: Leg used at visit 3 for ankle blood pressure [Cohort, Exam 3]
variable.value: UBAA02D (Scan date, day) equal to an even #
UBAA02D (Scan date, day) is missing and V3DATE31 equal to an even # for the day part
UBAA02D (Scan date, day) equal to an odd #
UBAA02D (Scan date, day) is missing and V3DATE31 equal to an odd # for the day part

variable.name: LEGSAM13
variable.description: Same leg used at visit 1 and 3 for ankle blood pressure [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: INCPAD3
variable.description: Incident PAD at visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PRVCHD33
variable.description: Prevalent coronary heart disease at visit 3, definition 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: PRVSTR31
variable.description: Prevalent stroke at visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: HYPTMDCODE31
variable.description: Hypertension lowering medication within past 2 weeks (visit 3) [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CHDRISK10YR_31
variable.description: Predicted 10 year risk of incident coronary heart disease (CHD) [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: STROKERISK10YR_31
variable.description: Predicted 10 year risk of incident ischemic stroke [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: DIABETESRISK9YR_31
variable.description: Predicted 9 year risk of incident type two diabetes [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE31
variable.description: Cholesterol lowering medication within 2 wks.: using 2004 Med. Code, visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CHOLMDCODE32
variable.description: Medications which secondarily affect cholesterol: using 2004 Med. code, visit 3 [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: CENTERID
variable.description: Recoded center ID [Cohort, Exam 3]

variable.name: V3DAYS
variable.description: Days since exam 1 [Cohort, Exam 3]
